summary_info.author: Atera networks
summary_info.title: Installation Database
summary_info.subject: AteraAgent
summary_info.comments: This installer database contains the logic and data required to install AteraAgent.

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: This signature detects the presence of a number of Windows API functionality often seen within embedded executables. When this signature alerts on an executable, it is not an indication of malicious behavior. However, if seen firing in other file types, deeper investigation may be warranted.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: InQuest Labs

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Generic Detection for multiple RAT families, PUPs, Packers and suspicious executables
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Lucas Acha (http://www.lukeacha.com)

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered hacktool. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

exiftool.Title: Installation Database
exiftool.Author: Atera networks
exiftool.Comments: This installer database contains the logic and data required to install AteraAgent.
exiftool.Subject: AteraAgent

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious DotNET CLR Usage Log Artifact
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of Usage Log files by the CLR (clr.dll). These files are named after the executing process once the assembly is finished executing for the first time in the (user) session context.
Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Adversaries may abuse msiexec.exe to proxy execution of malicious payloads.
Msiexec.exe is the command-line utility for the Windows Installer and is thus commonly associated with executing installation packages (.msi)

match_context.values: @{Product=Windows Installer - Unicode; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\TEMP\; OriginalFileName=msiexec.exe; Hashes=MD5=D3C21CD0C70DC36FDD8A61E4517A226D,SHA256=D7A94CE4C50764B8A6F67DB308F8609AC38F08D1113079EAF81A25AB44E72BA6,IMPHASH=13C7ACE23F99CD5FBC3ABD5C16BF2DCE; Description=Windows\xae installer; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Program Files (x86)\ATERA Networks\AteraAgent\Packages\AgentPackageUpgradeAgent\AgentPackageUpgradeAgent.exe" efa5e61b-2cc9-430f-bda3-026b13a586a7 "76097e73-304e-4601-b2a6-87f0fdc2546b" agent-api.atera.com/Production 443 or8ixLi90Mf "checkforupdates" 001Q300000CpeXcIAJ; CommandLine="msiexec.exe" /i C:\Windows\TEMP\ateraAgentSetup64_1_8_7_2.msi /lv* AteraSetupLog.txt /qn /norestart; FileVersion=5.0.17134.228 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Program Files (x86)\ATERA Networks\AteraAgent\Packages\AgentPackageUpgradeAgent\AgentPackageUpgradeAgent.exe; IntegrityLevel=System; Image=C:\Windows\System32\msiexec.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Remote Access Tool Services Have Been Installed - Security
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects service installation of different remote access tools software. These software are often abused by threat actors to perform

match_context.values: @{SubjectUserSid=S-1-5-18; ClientProcessId=1144; ServiceType=0x10; SubjectLogonId=999; EventID=4697; ServiceName=AteraAgent; SubjectUserName=DESKTOP-ET51AJO$; SubjectDomainName=WORKGROUP}
@{SubjectUserSid=S-1-5-18; ClientProcessId=5248; ServiceType=0x10; SubjectLogonId=999; EventID=4697; ServiceName=AteraAgent; SubjectUserName=DESKTOP-ET51AJO$; SubjectDomainName=WORKGROUP}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Windows Installer service (msiexec.exe) trying to install MSI packages with SYSTEM privilege

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=D3C21CD0C70DC36FDD8A61E4517A226D,SHA256=D7A94CE4C50764B8A6F67DB308F8609AC38F08D1113079EAF81A25AB44E72BA6,IMPHASH=13C7ACE23F99CD5FBC3ABD5C16BF2DCE; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\TEMP\; OriginalFileName=msiexec.exe; Product=Windows Installer - Unicode; Description=Windows\xae installer; FileVersion=5.0.17134.228 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Program Files (x86)\ATERA Networks\AteraAgent\Packages\AgentPackageUpgradeAgent\AgentPackageUpgradeAgent.exe" efa5e61b-2cc9-430f-bda3-026b13a586a7 "76097e73-304e-4601-b2a6-87f0fdc2546b" agent-api.atera.com/Production 443 or8ixLi90Mf "checkforupdates" 001Q300000CpeXcIAJ; CommandLine="msiexec.exe" /i C:\Windows\TEMP\ateraAgentSetup64_1_8_7_2.msi /lv* AteraSetupLog.txt /qn /norestart; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Program Files (x86)\ATERA Networks\AteraAgent\Packages\AgentPackageUpgradeAgent\AgentPackageUpgradeAgent.exe; IntegrityLevel=System; Image=C:\Windows\System32\msiexec.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Product=Windows Installer - Unicode; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\TEMP\unpack\; OriginalFileName=msiexec.exe; Hashes=MD5=07D7DE60D8A825D4FAEB94DB19623502,SHA256=6F55350AD77606C65C755DD2EEC985C6969FCF30D3F03D308B9C4F555B3EDDA4,IMPHASH=E4E40938E4BF6C66424859ED02171C41; Description=Windows\xae installer; FileVersion=5.0.17134.228 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\Temp\unpack\PreVerCheck.exe" /s /i sec_opt=0,confirm_d=0,hidewindow=1; CommandLine=msiexec /norestart /i "setup.msi" /qn /l*v "C:\Windows\TEMP\PreVer.log.txt" CA_EXTPATH=1 USERINFO="sec_opt=0,confirm_d=0,hidewindow=1"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\Temp\unpack\PreVerCheck.exe; IntegrityLevel=System; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\msiexec.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the stopping of a Windows service via the "net" utility.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Jakob Weinzettl, oscd.community, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\; OriginalFileName=net.exe; Hashes=MD5=DD0561156F62BC1958CE0E370B23711B,SHA256=FD41D0261C6D22572DA448BCB5CBBB98F78A2922D1F1074D25237CC82C8CE432,IMPHASH=86350518EAE83E4A09BBF6317BA1C570; Description=Net Command; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\syswow64\MsiExec.exe -Embedding 6DDF0C1BFAE9DB2C9B4CEEB4C25C70A6 E Global\MSI0000; CommandLine="NET" STOP AteraAgent; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\msiexec.exe; IntegrityLevel=System; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\net.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\; OriginalFileName=net1.exe; Hashes=MD5=B5A26C2BF17222E86B91D26F1247AF3E,SHA256=14CC5BE4C833ACC652195DEAD113E1C3B4AC0B98EA1AEAD11957836F9AE721CF,IMPHASH=3D3E7537BD3BA07738DC5CA8AD01B073; Description=Net Command; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="NET" STOP AteraAgent; CommandLine=C:\Windows\system32
